meanings.definition: The act of removing or getting rid of something.
meanings.sent1: The elimination of trash helps keep our environment clean.
meanings.sent2: Proper elimination of waste is important for public health.
meanings.sent3: The elimination of old toys made room for new ones.
meanings.sent4: Her elimination of negative thoughts brightened her outlook on life.
meanings.sent5: The elimination of weeds from the garden made it look more beautiful.

meanings.definition: The process of excluding or expelling something.
meanings.sent1: The elimination of distractions improved his focus.
meanings.sent2: Strict elimination of cheating ensures fair competition.
meanings.sent3: The elimination of sugary snacks from the pantry was a challenge.
meanings.sent4: The elimination of doubt from her mind brought clarity.
meanings.sent5: The elimination of unnecessary items decluttered the room.

meanings.definition: The act of defeating or removing a competitor from a competition.
meanings.sent1: His elimination from the race was unexpected.
meanings.sent2: The elimination of the top player shocked the fans.
meanings.sent3: The elimination of the reigning champion surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her elimination from the contest motivated her to train harder.
meanings.sent5: The elimination of the strongest team changed the dynamics of the tournament.
